name: Dachsbun
description: The Dog Pokémon. The pleasant aroma that emanates from this Pokémon’s body helps wheat grow, so Dachsbun has been treasured by farming villages.

abilities.name: Well-Baked Body
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from fire or fire-type attacks. Instead, its AC increases by 2 until it takes damage or after 1 minute, whichever happens first.

abilities.name: Aroma Veil
abilities.description: Any ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon automatically passes any WIS save they are required to make.
